column6: endonym]], the name with which the [[Sindar]] referred to their own people, being "the Elves",<ref>{{WJ
column7: Quendi}}</ref> in contrast to the [[High Elves]], the [[Dark Elves]] or the [[Laiquendi]].

column1: It was one of the most common words in Sindarin.
